basic.description:
An examination of selected topics in 15th-century Italian Renaissance painting.
LEARNING HOURS    126 (24L;12G;90P)
RECOMMENDATION    ARTH 214/3.0 and 215/3.0 (or ARTH 213/6.0).
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Quattrocento Painting

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of third year standing or above
